alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 6:41PM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Mogollon Rim and Little Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Minor tree damage and spotty power outages are also possible. Local blowing dust is also possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A narrow band of strong winds gusting from 50 to 60 mph is likely tonight through Tuesday morning immediately north of the Mogollon Rim stretching from near Doney Park to Meteor Crater and southward towards Heber-Overgaard.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
